Hi Eduardo,

There are three Shinto listings for Sadasuke. One of them used Minamoto in his 
signature, and generally, based on your photos, I suspect this is the work of 
Shimada Sadasuke of circa Kanbun or 1661. It is a very nice looking piece.

Gordon
